title: Shutdown's Nightmare Scenarios
description:
As the partial U.S. government shutdown grinds on, officials from Washington to Wall Street are plotting out the worst-case scenarios. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg's Christopher Flavelle who details how the livelihoods of millions of people hang in the balance the longer the shutdown continues. 
FOLLOW UP
Christopher's latest report: In a Month You’ll Wish the Shutdown Were Only as Bad as Today
You can follow Christopher at: @cflav 
----
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
